BasicInfo.short: Miso uses a second screen app to enhance the TV watching experience by offering viewers points and virtual badges for watching programs.

Products.name: Miso
Products.description: Miso is a 2nd screen experience that makes watching TV more fun and social. It's available on the iPhone, iPad, Android, and Web. Miso lets
